description:
Reliable fire starters for unreliable weather. These lead-free matches stay lit through gusting wind and pouring rain, and come in a rugged and water-tight container to keep them protected. A great addition to any emergency kit.

  • Contains 25 wind- and waterproof matches
  • Screw-on cap is waterproofed with an O-ring
  • Striking surface outside. Two additional striking surfaces are protected inside the case
  • Each match burns for 15 seconds
  • Extra-long, 7.2cm matchsticks protect fingers against burns
  • Dimensions are 3.8 x 8cm
name: UCO Hurricane Match Container with 25 Matches
